changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[SUGESTAOPEDIDO_PRE]( [IDItemDetalhePedido] [bigint] NULL, [cdItemPedido] [int] NULL, [IDItemDetalheSugestao] [bigint] NULL, [cdItemSugestao] [int] NULL, [IdLoja] [int] NULL, [cdLoja] [int] NULL, [dtPedido] [date] NULL, [tpWeek] [smallint] NULL, [tpInterval] [smallint] NULL, [cdReviewDate] [int] NULL, [vlLeadTime] [smallint] NULL, [qtVendorPackage] [int] NULL, [vlModulo] [decimal](11, 3) NULL, [vlEstoque] [decimal](11, 3) NULL, [vlTotalPedidosAberto] [decimal](11, 3) NULL, [vlPipeline] [decimal](11, 3) NULL, [dtProximoReviewDate] [date] NULL, [dtInicioForecast] [date] NULL, [dtFimForecast] [date] NULL, [vlForecast] [decimal](11, 3) NULL, [vlForecastMedio] [decimal](11, 3) NULL, [vlLeadTimeReal] [int] NULL, [vlEstoqueSeguranca] [int] NULL, [vlEstoqueSegurancaQtd] [decimal](11, 3) NULL, [vlPackSugerido1] [int] NULL, [qtdPackCompra] [int] NULL, [vlQtdDiasEstoque] [decimal](11, 3) NULL, [vlShelfLife] [numeric](18, 0) NULL, [vlSugestaoPedido] [decimal](11, 3) NULL, [blAtendePedidoMinimo] [bit] NULL, [IDFornecedorParametro] [bigint] NULL, [vlFatorConversao] [float] NULL, [blPossuiVendasUltimaSemana] [bit] NULL, [IDOrigemDadosCalculo] [int] NULL, [tpCaixaFornecedor] [char](1) NULL, [vlPesoLiquido] [decimal](11, 4) NULL, [vlTipoReabastecimento] [smallint] NULL, [blCDConvertido] [bit] NULL, [idCD] [int] NULL, [vlSaldoOO] [decimal](11, 3) NULL, [vlSaldoIW] [decimal](11, 3) NULL, [vlSaldoIT] [decimal](11, 3) NULL, [PackModulo] [decimal](11, 3) NULL, [PackCompra] [int] NULL, [qtVendorPackageAux] [int] NULL, [vlPackSugeridoAux] [int] NULL )
